doc.title: Witness from Dinotopia
doc.plot: Witness From Dinotopia is a half-hour special designed to generate awareness and high interest in ABC's six-hour mega-series event: Dinotopia, premiering Sunday May 12, 2002 AD. This unique half-hour special generates mystery and intrigue as it offers glimpses of the amazing world of Dinotopia. "Witness" is based on an interview between a print journalist and a curious young man who was recently picked up at sea - who claims to have spent years on an incredible lost island - Dinotopia.
